        private static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<Sound>> loadSoundsForSoundBoard​(java.nio.file.Path root)
        Loads all Sounds for a certain soundboard.
        Parameters:
        root - Directory in which the sound configuration files are stored
        Returns:
        Map with the soundboard categories as key and a List of Sound Objects.

      • loadSounds

        private static java.util.List<Sound> loadSounds​(java.nio.file.Path root)
        load a list of Sound Objects stored as json files on disk.
        Parameters:
        root - Folder where the json-files are stored.
        Returns:
        List of Sound Objects that were added previously to the app.

      • saveSoundBoard

        public static void saveSoundBoard​(SoundBoard sb)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Saves a soundboard to disk.
        Creates a folderstructure that resembles the sounndboard:
        SoundBoardname/
        __ambience/
        ____Ambience Sound 1.json
        ____Ambience Sound 2.json
        __effects/
        ____Effect Sound 1.json
        ____Effect Sound 2.json
        Parameters:
        sb -
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
